scenario.name: uac
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Supported: 100rel,replaces,timer,privacy,in-dialog Session-Expires: 100 Accept: application/sdp Min-SE: 90 Accept-Encoding: identity Accept-Language: en User-Agent: HUAWEI-EchoLife HG8240R/V1R003C80S001 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=huawei 1 1 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 18 9 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=ptime:20 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=ptime:20 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=ptime:20 a=rtpmap:9 G722/8000 a=ptime:20 a=sendrecv\x0D\x0A

PRACK sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 2 PRACK RAck: [$1] 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[field1]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [$2] Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Supported: 100rel,replaces,timer,privacy,in-dialog Session-Expires: 100;refresher=uac Accept-Encoding: identity Accept-Language: en Require: timer User-Agent: HUAWEI-EchoLife HG8240R/V1R003C80S001 Content-Length: 0\x0D\x0A
